# <type>: <subject>
#
# Types:
# feat: New feature
# fix: Bug fix (non-breaking)
# docs: Documentation changes
# bugfix: Bug fix
# refactor: Code refactoring
#
# Example: feat: add user authentication
#
# Keep the subject line under 50 characters
# Use imperative mood (e.g., "add" not "added" or "adds")
